relation: Meh. There's not much going on in the way of student life.
Delicious food! The culinary academy is talented. But it's kind of expensive.
They have dorms, but not on campus, and I don't stay there.
It's a great starter school. There are so many options here for changing your career path, and the school is growing every semester. They even have a new astronomy observatory on campus.
pageTitle: University of Hawaii Maui College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 12/09/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 1 of 13 Kyra from Wailuku, HI Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck i am willing to submit any information that i may be required to and also to dedicate myself to this college. i believe my money will be invested into a school that will benefit me with my future goals and help me make a smooth transition to a mainland university. Will enjoy being here i feel that i will definitely enjoy my time at maui community college. the scenery as well as campus are both beautiful and the beaches are only minutes away. it also allows me to become independent but know that im not far away from my relatives. Will learn a lot from studying this college, ive found it to be a great match to what im looking for. the classes are relatively small and there are many places on-campus that i can find help. after reading some reviews of instructors, i seen that they use different tools to help students understand the course. Login to rate or flag the reviews Molly from Kihei, HI 03/20/2012 Reviewer is A current student
